dcterms:description: A dataset used for decentralized continuous cooperative control in multi-agent reinforcement learning, evaluated in various environments.

dcterms:description: A benchmark for multi-agent reinforcement learning where individual units cooperate to defeat enemy bots across various scenarios.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:creator: Ronald J Williams
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a framework for statistical gradient-following algorithms in reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset

dcterms:description: A method for multi-agent reinforcement learning that employs counterfactual baselines to reduce variance in policy gradients.

F. Wolski
Prafulla Dhariwal

dcterms:description: An algorithm for reinforcement learning that optimizes policies using a clipped objective function to improve stability.

Gregory Farquhar

dcterms:description: A method for deep multi-agent reinforcement learning that factors the value function to improve learning efficiency.

dcterms:description: A multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithm that uses an actor-critic approach for environments with mixed cooperative and competitive dynamics.
